title: SadGoodbye
author: SadGoodbye
content: I got a card from a cousin of mine, a GTX 980 and it plays games on my desktop very well bit I can't get it to work with Nicehash, I got error here and there, as per my old post on here I want to use this card as experiment to dive into how crypto mining works and now I don't know, is there any mining app that can work with GTX 980? Thank you

comments.author: rdluffy
comments.body: Try to use NiceHash Legacy Forkfixhttps://www.nicehash.com/blog/post/nicehash-miner-legacy-1-9-0-22Or you can mine directly, without NicehashWhich coin do you want to mine? I can suggest a miner for you

comments.author: FP91G
comments.body: Quote from: SadGoodbye on September 30, 2022, 08:17:56 PMI got a card from a cousin of mine, a GTX 980 and it plays games on my desktop very well bit I can't get it to work with Nicehash, I got error here and there, as per my old post on here I want to use this card as experiment to dive into how crypto mining works and now I don't know, is there any mining app that can work with GTX 980? Thank you Try mining ethereum classichttps://miningpoolstats.stream/ethereumclassicInstall the latest video card drivers and try all the miners that the pools offer you.miner download linkshttps://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5405131Try to find a working miner. Although what do you want to get? 6 cents in Ethereum Classic coins every day with a payment for electricity several times more.

comments.author: batsonxl
comments.body: It is better look each miner and read which one still supports cuda 9 i guess. If miner supports and you have chosen right coin for that it will work.
